thread.title: Cindy

author: Cindy
title: Cindy
text: Recently, my husband was rushed to hospital by ambulance with a very serious diagnosis. I found myself with a 4 month old puppy in the car and no available support system, as I was out of town. I used my phone app from the emergency room and found an excellent dog sitter who was willing to take my dog immediately and indefinitely. I had only my dog's leash in the car, but my host was happy to supply whatever was needed. I really don't know what I would have done without Dog Vaycay.
